title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 41, Episode 6
description:
Tyson Apostol is joined by The Ringer’s Craig Horlbeck and Riley McAtee to give a detailed breakdown of Episode 6. They share their thoughts on the new merge challenge and discuss the Exile Island twist. Then, they dish out this week’s superlatives and give an update on Riley's and Tyson’s beards. Plus, the first-ever fan question on the show.  
Host: Tyson Apostol
Guests: Craig Horlbeck and Riley McAtee
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
